1.content: Choose your character. Simple as that.
1.title: Character Selection

11.content: You're young, and that's when you're most vulnerable! Most monsters make little distinction when it comes to age, so don't think turning on the water works will keep you out of a hungry horror's tummy. Choose a school level and then a student. Will they wind up on the road to a promising future, or will they be flushed into the sewer system? Their fate is up to you.
11.title: You're a human male attending school

111.content:
Nick
Age: 6

Nick is a plump young boy about to head off to Eatu Elementary for his first year of school. Thanks to the careful shielding of his parents, he has never really been exposed to monsters. Unfortunately human private schools cost and arm and a leg, so now he has to attend the first grade at the local public school. What awaits him at school? Will he make lots of new friends, or will he be digesting in the tummy of a fellow classmate before recess? One thing's for sure. Being a pudgy little butterball probably won't do him any favors!



Kyle
Age: 9

Is an energetic 4th grader with short, messy brown hair. He loves sports, soccer and kickball especially. Kyle has quite a few friends, monsters and humans, but he also has quite a big mouth. Highly competitive, Kyle likes to tease and mock the people he beats. His biggest rival is Earl, a dragon at least a foot and a half taller, from the 5th grade. Earl has become increasingly angry about losing to Kyle. The two students like to bet, and the stakes keep going up. Pretty soon Kyle could end up taking a bet or a dare he might not want to pay up!

Kyle has an interesting home life. His mother was eaten by an ogre shortly after he was born, leaving him with only a father and an older sister. His father is constantly traveling for work so he's often left in the care of his sister Michelle. Michelle is a witch in training and currently experimenting with size altering magic.



Mikey
Age: 10

Mikey is a timid blond haired boy in the fifth grade. Being shy, thin, and what many adults would deem 'cute' he'd make an excellent meal for most monsters. Well, perhaps not a meal, but a decent enough mid-afternoon snack at least. Fortunately he has protection. Not sharp teeth or claws, like some of his classmates, but something just as effective. Mikey has Courtney, a monster girl who just so happens to be his next door neighbor and best friend.
111.title: Elementary School

choices: Take a nap inside your teacher
1111.content:
Walking into your classroom, you gasp in shock at the odd assortment of creatures that fill the room. Sure, there are several human boys and girls, like yourself, but there are also monster children, the likes of which you would never have fathomed. Standing their in the doorway, mouth agape, the teacher turns to you and smiles, licking her lips in an almost hungry fashion. Not only is your teacher not quite human, in fact, she looks like some sort of humanoid ant. The first clue is her eyes, which are large and multisegmented, then their are the pair of antennae poking out of her hair, then their is her butt, which looks like the abdomen of a red ant, and finally, rather than clothes, her body is covered in an exoskeletal armor, covering her privates and her large bust.

As she walks up to you, you freeze up in terror. Is this it, is this scary monster going to eat you? With a smile on her face, your teacher bends down, her multisegmented eyes inches from yours. "Well, hello little one. Don't be afraid, I'm not going to hurt you." she says in a surprisingly kind voice.

Nervously, you look into her eyes, trying not to stare. "R-really? You mean you aren't going to eat me?" you ask softly.

A big grin lights up your teacher's face, and she gently rubs your cheek with her palm. "I wasn't planning on it. Why? Would you like to take a little nap in my belly?" she asks in a gentle way, running her hand gently over her armored belly.

Now, you have never had any inclination towards wanting to be eaten before, and you are too young to really appreciate girls, but the soft voice of your teacher almost makes you inclined to say yes. You fail to notice the light twitching of her antennae, or the gentle pulsing of her abdomen, signalling that she is using her mind altering pheremones to try to lull you into a state of peace. Besides being an effective measure to coax prey willingly into her belly, it's also a good way to keep her class calm and easily manageable.

So, what do you say? Are you going to trust your seemingly nice teacher and take her up on her offer, or will you pass on it and take your seat?
1111.title: Nick the first grader

choices: The school bell rings and the sound makes you snap out of it *
She opens her mandibles and slides your head inside her mouth
11111.content:
The pheromone the ant monster is producing is too powerful for your young mind to handle. Your mind dulls and gets cloudy as you think about her offer to take a little nap inside her belly. Your parents told you to always obey the teacher and taking a nap sounds like a wonderful idea to you. A small part of your mind worries about digestion, but that thought is ignored. You nod your head shyly at the teacher.

Her antennae twitch as she chuckles and pats you on the head, “Good boy, now take your clothes off. I don’t like the taste of fabric.”

You nod your head dumbly, your mind completely under the power of her pheromones. You remove your clothes from your pudgy body and stand in front of her naked.

The monster ant bends down and picks you up. She struggles a little but manages to hold you up, “You sure are a fat one! I’ll have to teach while sitting down today! Don't worry, you'll find the experience very pleasant.”
Where will this story go next? Your choices are below...
11111.title: Take a nap inside your teacher

choices: Your teacher keeps alive, at least for now *
111112.content:
Your teacher opens her mandibles and slips your head inside her mouth. Inside, it's rather slimy but some wierd thought in your head tells you it'll get better. After all, she said you'ld enjoy it! She continues swallowing you, having no trouble fitting your shoulders into the her rather adjustables mandibles. With a wierd slurping sound, she pushes farther in, forcing your head into her throat. As your body slowly traverses her throat, you realize it feels strangely nice.
Eventually, your entire body reaches her stomach and she lets out a small belch. The school bell rings, and class begins.
111112.title: She opens her mandibles and slides your head in...

1111121.content:
The teacher sits down at her desk, leaning back and letting her stomach rest against the desk. Clearing her throat, she grabs her teaching stick, pointing at a diagram on the chalkboard.
"Ok class, can anyone tell me what happens to food when it reaches here?" She asked, pointing at the stomach on the diagram, looking at the class as a few hands went up. "Sally?" She asked, looking at the wolf girl in the front row of the class.

"Food digests!" She said, and the teacher smiled and nodded.

"Very good, Sally! Now, because of Nick here..." She trailed off, resting a hand on her human filled stomach, it remaining still as the boy inside had no doubt gone to sleep, her belch earlier having drained some needed air. "We actually have a live demonstration! Though it would usually take a while, there are ways we can speed it up. Would anyone like to rub my belly to help speed things up?" She asked, and several hands went up, including the wolf girl's. "Let's start with Sally, then everyone can have a turn." She said, the wolf girl coming to the front of the class.

The class continued on, the teacher explaining everything that was happening as her stomach gurgled and groaned, slowly getting softer as the students took turns rubbing and pressing into her stomach, the shapes of the boy inside softening up, the teacher's lesson interspersed with belches as her stomach worked. Eventually, the bell rang, and class was dismissed, heading home for the day.

--------Scat Warning--------

Grading papers after school, she felt a pressure beginning to build in her colon. Getting out of her seat, her stomach much slimmer then before, she walked towards the faculty lounge. Walking past other teachers sitting inside, she headed into the bathroom, pulling down her pants with a bit of difficulty due to her new added weight, before sitting on the toilet with a sigh of content. She loved this part almost as much as she loved eating her prey. With a twitch of her abdomen, she sighed in relief as the first log was pushed out, quickly cooling as it coiled into the toilet, plopping into the water before the next log began. She moaned as she felt the bones interspersed in each lump and log that fell from her. She groaned as a sudden large pressure built, the coils of previous human coming to a temporary halt. Taking a deep breath, with a harder twitch of her abdomen, she pushed as hard as she could, her tongue hanging out as something larger then the rest was pushed out of her, falling into the toilet with a splash, the rest of her waste coiling out as well. Panting for a few seconds, she grabbed some toilet paper, reaching back and wiping. Standing up, her knees shaky, she looked back at the toilet, smirking as she saw the skull, half buried in her shit. Giving her stomach a pat, she smiled.

"Well Nick, hope you enjoyed your nap! Unfortunately, I don't think my class would be good for you, though I'm positive you'll do a lot better where you're going next!" She said with a chuckle, before reaching forward and pulling the knob, watching all that remained of her previous new student swirl around, before going down the drain, soon to be forgotten in the sewers.
1111121.title: You're slowly digested during class (Scat Warning)

1112.content:
"And Kyle and Earl are facing off again," Kyle's best friend Eric announces as Kyle kicks the soccer ball past Earl's head. Earl quickly ducks under the balls, and it's up to the goalie to stop the ball. Krystal, the serpent, tries to stop the corner shot. This game is riding on a lot. If Kyle wins, he gets a kiss from the water nymph Lily. If Earl wins, he gets the kiss. They were tied, 9-9, and next point wins. Eric had always been losing, and he was determined to win this one.

Krystal dives at the ball, and...
1112.title: Kyle the fourth grader

1113.content:
You could go with Mikey, or try out another kid.

Andrew
Age: 10
A fairly reserved young lad in the fourth grade, Andrew was adopted by a 9ft lion woman about 4 years ago. Coincidentally, the adoption took place on the day after his parents mysteriously disappeared. He loves his lion mother deeply, but he's not stupid. His mother had 'adopted' over a dozen other human children, girls and boys, some older, some younger, and in less than a month they had all disappeared. Years went by and Andrew watched as his mother visited both adoption agencies and 'veal' shops alike. But for some reason, Andrew was never touched, at least not until bath time. (Cats tongue bathe)
1113.title: More Young Boys

112.content:
Dave
Age: 12

Dave is a shrimpy young human in the seventh grade. He doesn't really have friends and does as much as he possibly can to not draw attention to himself. Somewhat of a bookworm, he likes to spend his afternoons in the school library reading and writing poetry. Dave knows he isn't the only outcast. A small harpy girl also likes to spend her after school time there. Dave wants to strike up a conversation but he's afraid to talk to monsters. She might be a kindred spirit, but she might also be more interested in dinner than someone to talk to. The only monster he talks to on a regular basis is the librarian, Ms. Carmela Rivera, a rakasha with a thick Spanish accent. He loves to talk to her about literature and is constantly showing her his poetry. She tells him constantly that he's 'cute enough to eat' but he likes to think she's joking.



Alex
Age: 12

Alex is a nonconformist kind of kid who dyes his hair and wears black. He doesn't really get into fights at school, and he's pretty peaceable and easy to get along with, he just has a different style than most. Unfortunately thats caused problems at home. His mother recently entered into one of the exceptionally rare human/monster relationships. Her fiancee is a rather large drider with silvery hair. He sees Alex as a problem child and the two have talked about different methods of 'reforming' him. Not is at little worried, and he has every reason to be. Parents have the right to treat their children as property. It's not unknown for humans to self their offspring to different venues. Schools (for faculty meals), restaurants, and grocery stores all bought up children. Just last month Alex's best friend had been sold to a catering service by his legal guardians and turned into a birthday cake for a giant boy. Alex hopes to avoid a similar fate. Does his mother love him? And, if so, does that love have a dollar amount attached to it?



Steven
Age: 13

An eighth grader who's generally well liked by all, Steven is safe in most circles. Steven hangs out with a rather interesting group of demi-human friends. There was Shelly, a large, spindly troll. There was AJ, a chubby Rakasha who took in more human calories than he could burn. And there was Emily, a giantess who, due to her species, had to take classes outside. She'd sit under the window of whatever class she was supposed to attend. Being so outgoing, and having such a diverse group of friends, Steven often puts himself unnecessarily in harms way. Sleepovers at AJ's, a Birthday party at Shelly's, going to a movie with Emily, Steven never shies away from a chance to hang out with his monster buddies. One day it might land him in one of their stomachs, or in one of their family members. Each of his friends has brothers, sisters, and parents who know Steven by name.
112.title: Middle School (Junior High)

113.content:
Brett
Age: 17

Brett is an intelligent, pessimistic, and somewhat paranoid junior. It's partially because of those traits that he has managed to survive for so long. Unfortunately love is blind, and stupid. This year he got his new Biology teach, Ms. Samantha Coils. Ms. Coils is a naga with aqua tinted scales and stunning red hair. She also has a decent sized rack. Brett usually can't help but stare dreamily at his professor as she slithers gracefully up and down the aisles, checking on students lab experiments. Recently she's noticed his gaze and offered him the chance to stay after school for some........ extra credit. Brett wants to but he's highly skeptical. Will he wind up as the teacher's pet, or the teacher's meal?


Arnold
Age: 18

A senior with only one more year left, Arnold will be glad to be gone. School was never that important to him and he spent the majority of his time just goofing off and putting others down. Extremely muscular and intimidating aesthetically (skull tattoos, leather jacket, etc) he's always been a force to be reckoned with despite being human. Unfortunately his confrontational nature is finally starting to have negative consequences. A group of neko (cat people) freshman he bullied mercilessly years prior have finally grown up and become somewhat accomplished preds, maybe even capable of stomaching a meal as big as Arnold himself. The lunch lady, a hulking ogress, has tired of his pranks, and has threatened to let her innards have their way with him if he causes a ruckus in the lunchroom again. There are also a number of accomplished male monsters somewhat put off by his reputation who'd like to put the human in his place, a stomach. Worst of all the Principal Victoria Summers wants to have a word with him after school. Mrs. Summers is an honest to god giant roughly fifty feet tall. She's so large a second building had to be built, unattached to the school, to serve as her office. Arnold hopes he can continue to rely on his own physical strength and bad boy image to survive, but with so many monsters with their eye on him, his days might be numbered.


Kevin
Age: 15

Kevin is a somewhat easy going freshman with messy brown hair. His best friend in the whole world is Tonya, a werewolf. Despite popular belief, werewolves can actually morph at their own digression, no full moon needed. The intimidating lupines are actually fully in control of their minds and, despite becoming a bit more aggressive and feral, they don't lose themselves after transforming. The two have an extremely playful relationship and Tonya likes to lick him and wrestle with him occasionally. They've known each other practically their entire lives and, though they're extremely close, Kevin is too afraid of rejection to ask her out. Tonya is admittedly bisexual and has had a small number of girlfriends, all of which of disappeared into her steamy gut. Tonya, who isn't particularly affectionate towards the people she's dated in the past, tends to poop them out with little or no regret.

Though Kevin loves hanging out with Tonya and his other friends, he has become increasingly wary of school. His homeroom teacher, Mrs. Gulpins, is a toad woman with a beehive hairdo and thick glasses. More than once hes witnessed his teacher unleash her long sticky tongue and swallow a hapless student whole for being tardy. She's recently taken to staring at him strangely and has done her best to try to catch him doing something wrong or breaking classroom protocol. Not sure what to do himself he's considering going to see Principle Summers. Despite humans having little rights, faculty aren't allowed to chow down on students without just cause. Perhaps his giantess principle could give him a room change?
113.title: High School

1132.content:
Another good smack to the head and cat boy goes down. He tries to get up again but a few kicks to the chest fix that. His friends just watch as they always do. This time it was the neko curled up on the floor who picked the fight, but Arnold sure as hell finished it.

As much as these losers have grown, they are still no match for Arnold. Now more than ever he had to remind them of that fact. If ever the nekos think to team up it would be the end of him. But that won't happen. They're cowards and by making an example of each individially, Arnold would keep it that way.

Although his grades are below average, Arnold is no idiot. He knows what he's got to do to survive, and he knows that intimidation might not carry him safely all the way through his final year. Though it has worked well for the past three years, some of the monsters are starting to realise their own strenghth. What Arnold needs is people on his side.

If he formed a gang then it wouldn't matter if the nekos teamed up. Although a lot of the guys hating him, the power and safety of a gang in this kind of environment will surely appeal to those who don't feel all that secure in their place on the food chain.

An easier option would be to take a girlfriend. Arnold's superior strength is very appealing to girls, both human and monster. He's taken advantage of this fact many times, but maybe it's time to have someone permanent. She'd have to be a monster of course. A lot of the human girls Arnold has been with mysteriously disappear when word gets around, and he needs a monsters strength to help him scare off potential preditors.

The gang and girlfried ideas are both good, but neither will help with the trouble he's starting to get with the school staff. There was a time when even the teachers were afraid of him. Low grades would usually earn you an intimate lesson in the digestive process but Arnold had always been the exception. He isn't the kind of guy who'll go down without a fight so he always got higher grades than someone who does.

But how times have changed. Teachers these days don't mind giving him bad grades, though so far they have yet to try and punish him for it. They probably expect Principal Summers to do it for them. The giantess probably won't try it this afternoon when Arnold is scheduled to meet with him, but if his grades don't improve, Principal Summers just might follow through with her threats. The only way to avoid that is to knuckle down and improve.

There a three clear options. Arnold needs to choose what he's going focus on to make it through his final year. Should he form a gang, go steady with a monster or work on his grades.
1132.title: Arnold the senior

11322.content:
Arnold has always been good at getting girls so he decides that having a girlfriend is probably the easiest way to protect himself. Of all the girls his been with in the past, there are two that immediately come to mind: a gryphon and a werewolf.

If it's physical strength that you're looking for then Gale Talons, the gryphon girl, is your best option. Like most gryphon's she's very territorial and gets jelous easily. In fact, when one of Arnold's human lovers disappeared, Gale would usually be noticably fatter the next day. This is something that Arnold could take advantage of. What better deterent could there be than a jelous girlfriend as strong as her.

There is a down side though. Arnold would have to have sex with her again. He's done it once but he doesn't really want to do it again. Not that it didn't feel good. Gale really knows what she's doing. It's just kind of scary. As stong as Arnold is, like a mouse to a cat, he is completely at the mercy of the gryphon when she gets her paws on him. And her size, she's taller than him when she's on all fours. It's a worry to say the least.

Maybe Megan the werewolf is a better option. Sex with her seems a lot more natural, and her strenght, even as a wolf, is not much greater than Arnold's. The only problem with her is her friends. The Pack, all werewolves in this school join it eventually. They don't like to bring humans into the fold but it's not unheard of when it comes to couples. Megan is Arnold's way into the Pack. They respect physical strength, and Arnold has plenty of that, so it shouldn't be too much of a problem getting in. Then he'd have the best protection possible.

So which will he choose, Gale the gryphon with her superior strength or Megan the werewolf with her superior friends.
11322.title: Go steady with a monster

choices: It's lunch time--she's in the cafeteria like everyone else.
It's after school,and she's headed home.
113222.content:
As mentioned before,Arnold's grade may have been low,but he was no intellectual pushover either.After thinking it over,he realized that by going steady with the werewolf,he'd not only take care of getting a monster girlfriend,but if he could get into her circle of friends,he'd also be taking care of gathering a gang in one fell swoop.And it wouldn't just be any gang--it'd be a werewolf gang.
That settled his decision.He was going to go ahead and try his hand at getting Megan to go out with him.But where was she now?
113222.title: Megan the werewolf

1133.content:
A 6 foot tall dragon with a bulging gut dashes into an alley way and comes to a stop as he realizes it’s a dead end. Before he can run back out of the alley a huge shape blocks the entrance. The huge wolf-like shape stands at 9 feet tall and towers over the dragon.

"Spit him out!" The female werewolf snarls as it bears its claws, "Spit him out or I'll gut you like a fish and take him out!"

The dragon's eyes bulge in fear and he nods desperately before he sticks a finger in his mouth. The huge bulge in his gut suddenly moves upwards into his neck then into his mouth. The dragon bends over and Kevin slides out of his mouth coated in saliva and stomach juices.

As soon as Kevin hits the pavement the dragon's vision suddenly goes dark as the werewolf shoves his head into her mouth. The dragon thrashes wildly in panic but the werewolf easily pins his arms to his side as she works her lips over his shoulders. She works her lips halfway down the dragon's chest before she uses her immense strength to lift the dragon into the air above her. Gravity then helps her quickly swallow down the rest of the dragon and her gut swells out immensely.

Meanwhile Kevin stands up off the ground and looks at his saliva soaked clothes with disgust. He turns his attention to the werewolf just in time to see the dragon's tail disappear into her mouth.

Tonya has silver grey fur coating her body and a head that looks more like a wolf’s than a human’s head. Her feet look like normal wolf paws except that all the claws are painted red. Her hands are look completely human except for the fur and claws that have also been painted red. She’s wearing baggy jeans and a shirt over her three pairs of breasts that are in the B-cup range.

Kevin again wonders if he should ask her out.

The werewolf's gut wiggles with the dragon's struggles as the she-wolf opens her mouth, "BEEELLLLCCCHHH!"

Kevin chuckles, "Thank you for saving me Tonya."

Tonya's grins and replies, "Don't mention it. Now let’s get to school."

Kevin says...

choices: Kevin decided to not risk being late and goes to class now.
11332.content:
Kevin looks down at his clothes that are still dripping with dragon drool and stomach juices before he says, "I'm going home to grab some clean clothes first."

Tonya looks down her snout at him and grins as she nods, “Alright Kevin, but don’t be late for homeroom! It’s obvious to the entire class that Ms. Gulpins has taken an interest in you.”

Kevin shivers at the reminder. A picture of his homeroom teacher appears in his mind. Ms. Gulpins is a tan colored toad woman with very warty skin. She’s a very obese toad with a beehive hairdo. To everyone’s disgust the only thing Ms. Gulpins wears is a pair of thick glasses over her extra wide mouth. She looks like she’s the same height as a full grown human but only because her squat toad posture makes it look like she’s not very tall.

Kevin and the werewolf exit the alley and go separate directions. Tonya stays in her werewolf form. She can shape shift but she prefers to stay in her werewolf form whenever she’s in public, because it’s safer.

After getting home Kevin quickly changes into some clean clothes. He’s just about to leaves when his stomach growls. He forgot to eat breakfast today and he contemplates making a sandwich before heading to school. He doesn’t have much time till school starts however. If he stops to make a sandwich he could be late, but maybe if he makes the sandwich really fast…

113321211.content: Kevin glances back, and to his horror, Ms. Gulpins looks to be getting ready for another wind up. In a desperate attempt to escape ingestion, he tries to run faster than he already is. It is to no avail, however, as Ms. Gulpins manages to latch her wet, sticky tongue onto Kevin's back. His heart drops at the realisation of what is about to happen. She pulls her tongue back into her mouth, launching Kevin toward her gullet too. She quickly catches him and easily swallows him in a single gulp. Students in her classroom watch as the bulge that is the 15yr. old freshman moves from her throat to her stomach, landing with a soft plop. Ms. Gulpins sighs in relief and mentions "I've been wanting to do that for a while. Thanks, Kevin." All the while, Kevin is struggling about and loudly protesting his new surroundings. Tonya sits at her desk, horrified. It is against school rules for a student(monster or otherwise) to threaten a teacher, and there's not gonna be any way that Ms. Gulpins is gonna willingly cough up her friend without a threat, and that might not even work. Tonya decides to...
113321211.title: ...Tries to catch Kevin again

1133212111.content:
Much to Tonya's heartbreak of loosing her friend, she decides to stay seated, not creating any more of a scene than Kevin did. She goes through the rest of the day, worried and grieving for Kevin. One half of her brain says "You betrayed you best friend!" and the other half says "Humans are a dime a dozen." After school, ms. Gulpins goes home and lies down to digest her meal. Kevin hasn't stopped struggling, however. He hasn't stopped pleading either. Almost every word out of his mouth is some variation of "Let me out!", which is muffled by Ms. Gulpins' fat layers. She quickly dozes off into a deep sleep, leaving Kevin with nobody to hear his cries. After about an hour, he begins feeling slight tingling. His heart stops, as fear overcomes him. He knows what the tingling means. The digestion process has started, and he doesn't like it. He begins pleading and yelling louder than before, still being heard by no one. After an hour or two, the tingling turns to a painful burning sensation. He begins pounding on the inside of Ms. Gulpins' stomach walls in desperation. After about 30 minutes of fighting, his muscles start to get weak, and he can barely move him arms or legs. He is left to experience the rest of digestion with no motor functions. He keeps yelling, his voice getting hoarse after awhile. He soon starts to feel his eyes getting heavy, and as much as he tries to fight it, sleep overwhelms him. He passes out, never to wake up again. Ms. Gulpins wakes up in the morning, and notices that the bulge in her stomach is mostly gone. Her stomach grumbles, and she rubs her belly, joking "I guess you're ready to come out, huh?".

She hops off the couch and makes her way to the bathroom, where she hops in and sits down on the toilet, and begins pushing. The brown remains of Kevin come sliding out, and once she's done, she flushes and goes on with her life.

After school, Kevin rides the elevator up to Principle Summers' desk top
113322.content:
Kevin decides not to risk it, he's already on thin ice. It probably wasn't even too smart to head home for a change of clothes. Still, he just couldn't sit in soggy clothing, dripping with corrosive acid, all day long. His skin would by red and raw by the time he'd finally get home; he, unfortunately, knows from experience.

Hauling ass he makes his way to Eatu High. Opening the door to his homeroom Ms. Gulpins notices who it is and looks at the time excitedly. Kevin eyes the clock at the back of the room. Oh no, he only has thirty seconds! Ms. Gulpins doesn't consider you 'here, and on time' unless your butt is firmly planted in a seat. Luckily his seat is near the front of the room next to Tonya (she ate the girl who originally sat there just so that she'd be seated next to Kevin). Rushing to his desk he sits down right as the bell rings.

Tonya gives him toothy grin, "Close one!"

"I'll say." Kevin sighs

Ms. Gulpins ribbits in disappointment. Adjusting her glasses, she takes attendance while the class fraternizes. When the second bell rings the class gets up and starts to file out. When Kevin passes by Ms. Gulpins desk she reaches out and pinches his rear. Kevin jumps in the air a little. This is the second time shes touched his ass. He knows she's not trying to flirt with him. She's just checking to see how plump her future meal is. Kevin shivers slightly, it's kind of scary knowing that when his teachers bulging eyes are focused on him she's appraising him, as if he were a piece of meet.

"Try to fatten up a little there Kevin." Ms. Gulpins suggests, "It's not healthy for a boy your age to be so lean. You should really consider a strict diet of chocolate cake and chipped ham. It'll help you...... fill out." A thin strand of drool dribbles down her wide jaw as she looks him over.

"Er..... Thanks for the advice Ms. Gulpins, I'll deeply consider it."

Kevin exits out into the hall. A powerful fuzzy arm snakes around his back and gently grips his shoulder. Kevin leans against his friend, her fur feels good against his skin. He instantly feels better.

"She's way out of line." Tonya growls, "If she keeps giving you crap I might just have to have toad legs for dinner."

"Don't worry about it, I just need to keep a low profile and make it to class on time." Kevin assures her.

Tonya shakes her head in response, "No, she's gunning for you. I'm telling you, go see Principle Summers after school today. You might be a human but you've got rights."

It was true that teachers weren't supposed to digest students unless it was disciplinary action, but Kevin wasn't too keen on reporting Ms. Gulpins for harassment. Principle Summers was a towering giantess whose office was its own building, separate from the High School. It was rumored she'd fertilized Eatu Highs entire campus with bullies, but Kevin kind of doubted it. Certainly she'd eaten enough bullies to accomplish such a feat, but she just seemed too professional to do something so crude. Principle Summers was tough, but supposedly fair, and willing to go out of her way to help rule abiding students of all species. She might get Ms. Gulpins to stop groping him, but then again you never know. She was a maneater too.

"I'll..... think about it." Kevin shrugs.

Tonya frowns slightly, worried about her best friend, but then she catches a whiff of something and perks up, "Do you smell that scent?"

"Of course not." Kevin laughs.

Pivoting on her heel, Tonya turns around (rotating Kevin in the process). There's Beth, a sophomore girl dressed in camo, and an open lesbian, "Check out those thighs!" Tonya lets her tongue loll out of her mouth.

Kevin just shakes his head, how could Tonya still be hungry? She still had half a dragon waiting to be sucked into her intestines!

"I think I'm going to ask her out soon." Tonya says, half to Kevin and half to herself. The human boy just sighs and rests his head against her fuzzy arm. Tonya likes to fool around with the females. There's a nasty rumor going around that, once she's finished, she gobbles up her girlfriends. Being her best friend, Kevin knows all the rumors are.... absolutely true. With the number of disappearances racking up, everyone else should realize the truth too. He's just amazed at the number of girls still willing to risk dating her.

Kevin looks up at his preoccupied friend. Truth be told hes had a crush on Tonya for a long while now. He wants to tell her but he's a bit scared of rejection (not so much the eating part, he knows she wouldn't do that sort of thing to him).

"Yum." Tonya smacks her lips as Beth makes her way around a corner. Kevin isn't sure if the 'yum' is because she's feeling frisky, or because she's anticipating devouring the sophmore's thick thighs, "Come on, lets head to class." Tonya says.
113322.title: Kevin decided to not risk being late and goes t...

1133222.content:
After several hours of learning and avoiding some seriously close calls, the final bell rings and almost all of the students getting up from their seats to head for off for the day, while the rest stew in guts of their colleagues. As several of them talk about their plans, while a few of them go to their afterschool programs. Meanwhile, Kevin and Tonya head off to Mrs. Summers's building.
"You ever been here before?" Kevin asks, out of the blue, surprising Tonya a bit.
"Sure, after getting into fights with other students and teachers, and occasionally gulping them down, I eventually met her. She's a reasonable person; sure, she was strict on me, but she was able to tell it was for a good reason and give a warning," she replies.
"You sure you want to go in by yourself? There may be some teachers and staff, looking for a snack, a human sized one," she adds in, warning her human friend.
Kevin gulps before answering her question.
"I'll be fine! You just go and try to seduce Beth, okay?"
Her mouth turns into cocky smirk and she hugs Kevin tightly from the side.
"Try? Kevin, I don't have to try, you know that! I'll see ya later!"
She runs back, before stopping and turning back.
"Be careful of the secretary; she quite the glutton!" She warns, before going off to find Beth.
Watching her go before she disappeared, Kevin sighs to himself and goes inside the building.

Inside the building, Kevin sees a big lobby with multiple chairs in several rows and a desk in front of an elevator door. Behind the desk was a blonde female centaur, busy with some paperwork. Noticing Kevin, she smiles and waves him over. Walking over to her, Kevin notices she has a predatory glint in her eyes and her name is Ms. Trojan.
"I wish to speak to Principle Summers, Ms. Trojan," he asks politely.
The centaur continues typing on her computer before addressing the human in front of her.
"She's quite busy, so if it's something major, I'll have to book an appointment. So, if you may, come over here to fill in the places that needed to be filled, we can get started," she said, motioning him to come closer.
"It's nothing serious, just something quick, that's all!" Kevin replied, not wanting to come closer to her.
A defeated sigh escaped her lips and she pointed towards the elevator door. Quickly thanking her, Kevin rushes over and enters the elevator, noticing her huge gut hanging a few inches from the floor as he was passing by. Once the doors closed, Ms. Trojan whines loudly.
"I was so close!"

Exiting the elevator, Kevin enters the office, somewhat sadden that it was just a normal office, though on a bigger scale. Walking around on Ms. Summers's desk, Kevin notices that she wasn't there. A flushing was heard from a door and after the sink is heard, the woman in question opens it, surprising Kevin. Wearing a business suit with a short pencil skirt, revealing her massive (even by normal standards) cleavage and a bit of her wide, big, round ass, the brunette principal strolls in, rubbing her chubby stomach in satisfaction. Her hourglass figure entice Kevin, making fall in love her, until she stops before her desk and lifts her leg.
PPPPHHHHUUURRRT!
A large fart exited her anus and into the world, a deep sigh of relief from its creator. Soon the smell hits and Ms. Summers waves her hand to dissipate the smell from her face and rear. Being closer to the source and smaller in size, Kevin gags on the smell, catching her attention.
"Oh my... Are you alright?" She asks in a motherly tone, coming closer to the smaller human, clearly embarrassed.
Coughing, he signals he's okay and the both of them wait until the smell becomes bearable. Once it does so, the giant sits down in her chair and folds her hands together.
"What brings you in today,..."
"Kevin."
"Yes, Kevin," she asks, now in a business like tone.
"It's about Ms. Gulpins. You see..."
The 'ground' shakes as Ms. Summers's farted again, her face red once more.
"Sorry, that was my post-dump lunch gas. So, I'm kind of gassy," she explains, her face becoming more red and much cuter to Kevin's perspective.
"Ahem, Ms. Gulpins has been pinching my butt, to see if I'm fat enough to eat and will eat me for the smallest action against the school, like being tardy."
A moment of silence, as the giantess leans back to digest the information given to her.
"I see, thank for telling me this. I'll go have a talk about this with her. Anything else?"
"No, madam. Thank you, Ms. Summers," Kevin said, heading back to the elevator and possibly, leaving his newest crush behind.
"No problem! If anything else comes up, talk to me. I'm here for you," she said, waving good bye to him as he leaves.

The next day, Kevin is siting in his seat, just before the bell.
"How it go?" Tonya asks, coming beside him.
"I'm about to see when the bell goes. But honestly, I don't know! Ms. Summers said she'll talk about it to Ms. Gulpins," he replied, uncertain of his future.
As the final minute before the bell begins, the door opens, revealing...
1133222.title: To the principle's office we go!

choices: A private school run by hungry nuns
12.content: Being a girl won't save you in this world. With ravenous teachers and students to deal with you may not make it to graduation.
12.title: You're a human female attending school

choices: Regina, the girl raised by dragons
Katie, the shy girl with a monster under her bed
121.content:
Regina
Age: 6

Regina became an orphan when she was still a baby after a dragon and a dragoness couple gobbled up her parents. She didn’t stay an orphan for long however, because the dragons that ate her parents decided to adopt her. So Regina lives with the dragoness named Duriana and her dragon husband named Werlow as their child. Regina doesn’t know that the two dragons that she thinks of as her mother and father actually ate her real mother and father (a fact that her adopted parents don’t want her to know). Regina also hasn’t figured out the obvious fact that she’s adopted.

Duriana and Werlow have raised Regina as if she’s a dragon like them. They even taught her how to vore! This has caused her to think that she’s a dragon herself and she sees nothing wrong with gobbling down other humans. When Regina is finally old enough to go to school, her belief that she’s a dragon causes a great deal of confusion for the teachers and students of Eatu Elementary.

Katie
Age: 7

Katie’s a shy little girl who still sucks her thumb. She’s afraid of the dark and thinks that a monster is living in her bedroom closet. Her parents always humor her and check her closet. Sure enough, they never find anything inside. That’s because there isn’t a monster living in Katie’s closet… she doesn’t know it yet, but a monster actually lives underneath her bed.


Which story do you want to follow?
121.title: Elementary School

choices: Back to bed to rest up
1211.content:
Unknown to you, the only reason the dragon couple adopted you was because they sensed you were one of very few humans with the potential to become a monster upon hitting puberty. Your grandmother was a dragon who had fallen in love with a powerful human male, hence you did not find it weird to have a dragon mom and dad. To your grandmother's grief, gave birth to a 'normal' human girl, your real mother. However, this girl was strong and managed to live to give birth to you before she and her husband her eaten alive and the dragon couple became your new parents...

"Don't worry, Regina." said your mom quietly. "You will have your scales when you get older."

"But I want my scales now." you whined. "Everyone at school is starting to tease me, calling me a late bloomer!"

Just then, you felt a tinge of pain in your side. You lifted your shirt to look and let out a squeal of delight. "A scale!" you screamed, turning to mom. "It's starting!"

Duriana looked at the small scale, protruding out of your skin and smiled as a second one appeared right next to it, causing you to wince. "Yes, it's starting, dear." she told you. "But that means you are going to have to miss school for the day."

"How come!?" you asked, whining again. "I want to show my friends that I'm changing, just like I said I would!"

Mom did not answer at first, she was concerned that the other monsters would see you as an abnormality and try to devour you before you could fully transform. "It's starting much earlier that we had expected." she thought. "This could be very bad, especially if this turns out to only be a partial transformation."

"This is a very delicate phase in your life, sweetie." she told you. "You are staying home for a while but for now, we you are going..."
1211.title: Regina, the girl raised by dragons

choices: A kind young dragon offering help.
12111.content:
Two hours later, you were in the human wing of the hospital in the office of your family physician, Dr. Anyone. He was an old changeling, a monster who could become any monster or human at will. This allowed him to offer his services to any monster or human. You had always seen him as a dragon, at your parents request. Unknown to you, the humans he could not cure, or could not pay, he ate.

"What seems to be the problem, Regina?" he asked you kindly.

"Problem!?" you asked, surprised. "Are you kidding!?" you lifted your shirt. "My scales are growing!"

Dr. Anyone looked at your belly in complete shock, half of your lower torso was fully covered in green scales with more growing, causing you to wince with pain. "do they hurt growing in?" he asked.


"Just a little." you said, tears forming. "But its worth it, soon I'll be a dragon, just like mom and dad said I would!"

Dr. Anyone turned to Duriana, concerned then turned back to you, smiling. "I'll have to take a few tests to check on the speed of your transformation." he told you. "I will leave the room for a moment while you slip into the examination gown."

With that said, Dr. Anyone escorted Duriana out of the room, into the hall. "I did not want to say this in front of your adopted daughter." he said. "I have seen transformations like this before, they are extremely painful. Only one out of a hundred cases survive the changes." he paused, placing a clawed hand onto her shoulder. "If you want her to survive, we have to make the transformation a very slow one and prey her class mates and teachers accept her."

Duriana teared up slightly. "I love her as if she were truly my own daughter." she said. "Please do what you must to make the transformation a slow one. I will call her school and inform them that she is going through 'the change'."

Dr. Anyone paused, tilting his head slightly. "The rare occurrence of which a human mutates into a monster?" he asked. "That's a long shot..."

"Regina's grandmother was a dragon, her grandfather was a powerful human." replied Duriana. "It is possible!"

"I will run some tests." promised Dr. Anyone. "If I find that it is possible, that is what I will write in my report."

"Thank you, doctor." said Duriana with a sigh.

The next day, you discovered that your entire chest, back, arms, and hands were covered in green scales. You opened your curtains and gasped happily at how your scales shined in the morning light. You were in considerable pain as each scale that grew into place felt like a bee sting but you were smiling in spite of it.

"My finger nails are starting to change into claws." you whispered, shedding happy tears. "I have to show everyone at school that I'm changing, just as I said I would!"

You begged mom to allow you to go to school and she eventually agreed but only to half a day so your classmates and teachers could see you were telling the truth. You were ecstatic as you got ready for school but, like the other monsters, you wanted to show off your scales and refused to wear a shirt.

"Mommy, I want them to see how far I have changed in so little time!" you protested. "It's just for half a day... please!?"

Mom sighed. "Very well, dear." she said. "Just remember what the doctor told you, take it easy, don't get too worked up, this is a very delicate transition you are going through."

"I'll be careful, mommy." you promised.

At school, the reactions from the students and teachers varied from amusement to shock to utter terror. Your homeroom teacher, a she-demon, with short pointed horns protruding from her forehead, smiled. Her name was Miss Glutton, she too had sensed the potential within you and inwardly admired your courage, willingly returning to school during your certain to be painful transformation.

"She is going to be in for a rough week." thought Miss Glutton. "If she survives it, that is."

As you sat at your desk, feeling the changes continue, someone tapped you on the shoulder. You turned, curious, to find yourself facing...
12111.title: To the doctor

121111.content:
You turned, curious, to find yourself facing a young girl dragon who smiled kindly at you. "Hey, Regina." she said, gently. "I'm Demona Inferno, I attend middle school here at Eatu school." she paused. " I hear you're going through 'the change'."

"Yep!" you said, smiling. "Mommy told me that it was a slow, delicate change but she let me come back to school anyway so I could show everyone I wasn't lying... I am a dragon!."

"You sure showed us." said Demona, rolling her eyes. "What do you say I help you through the changes? You are going to be going through a few things that... err... other dragons normally only experience during their infancy."

"Infancy?" you asked, confused.

"Sure." replied Demona. "Well, for starters, your lips are not armored to protect them from your flame. Dragons usually all develop this in their infancy, thus you are a 'late bloomer'." she paused, seeing your hurt expression. "No offense."

"It's okay." you said. "It's just that I've been laughed at a lot, humans and monsters alike, not believing me."

"Trust me, Regina." said Demona with a smile. "They all believe you now." she then turned serious. "Listen to me, though, you are very vulnerable right now so you have to be careful unless you want to beat to death or eaten alive."

You gulped at that, fearful. "What should I do first?"

Demona smiled. "Just stick with me, kid." she told you. "I'll make a real monster out of you."

Just then, you felt a burning in your throat, causing you to let out a muffled scream as a light smoke began to billow out of your mouth! You immediately began to panic as you saw droplets of your own blood dripping onto your desk.

"It's your first flame!" breathed Demona, as if she were watching a baby. "That's incredible, you are progressing so fast!"

"H.... Hel... Help me!" you managed to sputter. "It hurts, it... it hurts!

"Oh!" Demona snapped out of her trance and roughly tapped you on the back. "Spit it out!"

A small ball of flame shot from your bleeding mouth and struck a human boy in front of you, catching him on fire! He let out a blood curdling scream and began to jump around, trying to put the fire out as humans and monsters alike laughed at him before someone came with a jacket to help but the fire out.

"I'm so sorry!" you said, tearfully. "It was an accident!" then you caught the scent of his burned flesh and subconsciously began to drool. "On the bright side, you smell yummy..."

The boy turned to you, horrified as you, again subconsciously, licked your lips and smiled slightly. The boy screamed and scrambled to get away, that was a mistake as it only enticed you to give chase. You were very fast and strong for your age, thanks to your mom and dad, and quickly caught the boy, your developing claws digging into his flesh.

"Let me go!" the boy demanded, struggling in vain. "Oh, God, don't eat me!!"

You had never eaten a live human before, only dead ones your mom had brought you when teaching you how to vore and you wondered what it would be like to have a live human moving around in your stomach. Only, you were also wondering if you were ready for this yet...

What do you do?
121111.title: A kind young dragon offering help.

choices: I have to ask mom first.
1211111.content:
You licked your lips, with the other students and teachers looking on, curious. The boy was trembling, then screamed as you opened your mouth impossibly wide and swallowed his head whole. You could hear him screaming inside your throat as you broke his shoulders, making him thinner so to fit down your throat then continued to swallow the hapless boy down, breaking his hips as the reached your mouth then sucked his legs and feet down like two strands of spaghetti, swallowing the last of him.

"The live humans tickle going down." you said, giggling, as you rubbed your swelled stomach. "He was my first live meal."

Everyone, monsters and humans alike were is shock that you, technically a human, swallowed down a live human as if it were common place. Only, you had forgotten your mother's warning about pushing yourself too far and suddenly vomited the boy back up, who moaned loudly in pain. while you moaned yourself, a small tail ripping out the back of your skirt, lifting it up enough to show off your panties.

"What happened?" you asked, turning to Demona. "I've always been able to keep down the dead humans."

Demona giggled, along with Miss Glutton. "Two reasons, Regina." said Demona. "One, you are not used to having a live anything inside of your stomach, it came as a shock to your body." she smiled, adding. "Don't worry, the first one always gets away, you'll have better luck with your next live meal."

"The second reason is very simple, Regina." said Miss Glutton, walking over to the moaning boy. "The changes you are experiencing are painful, so painful, it can and will cause you to lose appetite."

"Oh." you said, blushing brightly. "Then what should we do with him."

Miss Glutton looked at the boy, miserably crawling towards the exit, trying to get away and smiled. "I'll cut him a break today." she said. "I will take him to the nurses office and tell them that he managed to fight his way out of a monster's stomach, that will earn him fair treatment and a pass home."

With that, Miss Glutton gently picked the boy up and carried him out of the room. "Everyone remain as you are." she said, before walking out, no eating anyone until I get back."

With the teacher gone, the humans became nervous as you turned to Demona. "Um... can you help me with my skirt?" you asked, politely. "My panties are showing."

Demona giggled then cut a long hole into the back of your skirt before carefully guiding your small tail through it. "These changes are just the beginning, Regina." she told you. "Right now, it all cosmetic, the changes inside should start soon."

You smiled. "I can't wait!"

Soon after, Miss Glutton returned with a yellow piece of paper in her hand. "Regina, the principal needs to talk to you."

You paused, fearful. "Did I do something wrong?" you asked.

"Nothing.... wrong." replied Glutton, wincing. "Just.... unexpected."

Nervous, you walked out of your homeroom and went down the hall to the office of the principal and knocked on the door.

"Come in, Regina." came an authoritative female voice.

You swallowed hard, knowing well the rumors of the giantess principal who ate students who did not stay in line and slowly walked in, closing the door behind you. "You... You wanted to see me, ma'am?" you asked.

The principal, Ms Swallow, smiled at you. "Relax, Regina, you are not in trouble." she said. "I merely need to speak to you about your current condition, being a human going through such a rough transition."

"I'm a dragon! I am! I am!" you wailed, in tears. "My scales prove it! I even ate my first live human today!" you blushed brightly then more quietly added, "Only I threw him up, I was in too much pain to keep him down."

Ms Swallow giggled. "The first one always gets away, Regina." she said, hiding her confusion and curiosity. "For now, at least until 'the change' is complete, I'd stick with dead humans." she paused. "I want you to take it easy today and don't try anything your parents do until you get a clean bill of health from your doctor, okay?"

You smiled. "Okay, Ms Swallow."

The principal nodded. "There is one more thing I need to talk to you about." she said. "How would you like to work for me as an office assistant until these changes are complete, I want to see them happen."

"What about my school work?" you asked.

"I'll have them brought up to you." promised Ms Swallow. "What do you say, I'll pay you out of pocket, and it will give you some clout in the school."

"Will Demona still be helping me?" you asked. "she approached me during homeroom."

Ms Swallow smiled. "I'm the one who sent her." she said. "I just need you to work for me for a few hours each day, after school so I'm not spending hours on end on my own filing paperwork and the such."

What do you say?
1211111.title: Eat the boy alive

choices: Please, try one of my scales
12111112.content:
Ms Swallow smiled, upon hearing that. "I guess I would be over stepping my authority if I did not ask for your parents, approval first." she said. "You are a remarkable young la... err... dragin."

"I just don't want to get my hopes up, just to have mom or dad say no." you replied. "The doctor said that I'm in a very delicate stage of my life right now."

"The change, yes, I know." said Ms Swallow, patiently. "That's why I want you to be working with me, rather than being out there. I want to see you blossom into your true form in a safe environment."

Unknown to you, your grandmother and Ms Swallow had a history, she had saved the principal's life when she was very young, going through the change herself. Upon hitting puberty, Ms Swallow had a very massive growth spurt, moving up from a tiny four foot six to a giant twelve foot three in a matter of days! As an adult, she was now a towering fifteen feet tall but the halls and rooms were all built to accommodate her size as there were giantess students in the school as well.

"If it were not for that little girl's grandmother, I would not have made it to today." she thought. "I owe her my life and now I can repay that debt by offering her granddaughter the same protection."

"Ms Swallow..." you asked, interrupting her thoughts. "...the first bell just rang."

"Ah, I will send word to your teachers that you will be spending classing with me today." she said. "You have a medical condition that warrants me to place you into temporary isolation."

"I... Isolation?" you asked, fearful. "I'm not sick."

Ms Swallow giggled. "No, you are not sick." she replied. "But the changes you are going through are painful, right?"

You nodded. "They're getting a little worse."

"Your cries of pain can and will disrupt your classes." said Ms Swallow. "Technically, you should be home in bed, taking pain killers but I will allow you to take your classes at school, here with me, if your parents allow it." she paused, thinking, then asked, "Would you care to share a smoothie with me?"

"A smoothie?" you asked curious.

"Yes, a 'human' smoothie." replied Ms Swallow. "Humans, boy or girl, who step too far out of line and are sent to me, I either punish with demerits or eat them in the form of a sandwich or smoothie."

You swallowed hard. You had swallowed dead humans and one live human whole, though not for long, but you have never witnessed a live human being osterized into a drink before. "Does it really hurt them?" you asked, wincing.

Ms Swallow shrugged. "Does it matter?" she asked. "They are dead in a few seconds so, if it does, its not for very long and they are very tasty." she looked at you, her curiosity rising. "I'm going to have one, you decide weather or not you want some of it, to try."

With that, she walked over to a massive refrigerator and pulled out a small girl naked girl, crying and shivering. Both her wrists were tied behind her back, her ankles were tied together with a fine string, and she had been gagged. "This is Amanda Jenkins." said Ms Swallow. "This poor girl was accidentally stung by a snake demon named Naga, they were best friends and Naga offered to die with her as punishment but Amanda forgave her and accepted her slow death."

"That's very touching ." you said. "You put her in there so not to feel any pain?"

Ms Swallow nodded. "Also to slow the poison's progress." she said. "Only a scale from a baby dragon can save her..."

She looked at you, intently. What do you say?
12111112.title: I have to ask mom first.

choices: Your job pays a high salary
Your job lets you work out of your house
13.content: Congrats! You're one of the lucky few who survived their school years and made it into adulthood. That doesn't mean you're out of the woods though. You might be a veteran at avoiding bellies, and you might not be as desirable as a human in their prime, but the odds are still stacked against you. Select an option and then select a character/career. Good luck, you'll need it.
13.title: You're a fully grown human out in the work ...

131.content:
Robbie
Age: 27

Rob has always had a fascination with monsters, and the concept of being eaten alive. It's what landed him in his current profession which is, perhaps, the deadliest job available for a human. Rob is, in fact, a dentist. Every day he's exposed to the maws of countless monsters. Some monsters, such as giants and the larger variety of dragons, are so huge that he actually needs to walk into their mouth to give their teeth a proper inspection. It's only a matter of time before he slides down the throat of a hungry client.



Stan
Age: 20

Young, with wiry muscles and light brown hair, and a 23yr. old fiance named Laura. Stan is an excellent human specimen. So much so that he realized he could make money selling his body to science. Though test subjects can be taken forcibly, it's usually easier and requires less paperwork when they're willing. For the most part all he's had to do is swallow several tablets and drink several concoctions, which resulted in no documentable side effects. Today though he's taking part in an experiment that's far more deadly. He's going to be testing a new lotion meant to stave off digestion. After stripping down naked and applying the stuff liberally to his skin, he's off to meet the monster who'll be devouring him. If successful, he'll be paid a handsome fee. If not, well, he'll probably be flushed and forgotten.


Louis:
Age: 19

Not one for college, and a big fan of aquatic life, Louise decided to do freelance work as a deep sea diver. It's more lucrative than you'd think. The seas can be fairly deadly, for more than one reason, and there are dozens of shipwrecks each year. Louis is often hired to help track down and confirm the locations of said sunken vessels. He sometimes even helps with retrieving precious cargo. Unfortunately, due to the nature of his work, this sometimes means he has to come in contact with what caused the wrecks. Sometimes the culprit is nothing more than jagged rocks or a sandbar. Sometimes though it's something much worse.
131.title: Your job is highly dangerous

choices: Samantha the sphinx is his next patient
Betty the 30 foot ogress is his next patient
Unknown to Rob, a monster secret admirer won't let him get eaten
1311.content:
"Okay Vena you're all done." Rob tells the naga as he finishes examining her teeth.

The naga closes her mouth and smiles, "Thank you."

Robbie the dentist sighs in disappointment as the naga slithers out of the room. Ever since he was a kid he has been fascinated with monsters and has secretly always wanted to be eaten. 1312.content:
Sometime in the year 1994, Stan hums a tune as he drives his hunk-a-junk car into a parking lot in front of a large building. After turning off the engine, he gets out of his car and looks at the building. The words VoreTech Labs are written on the side of the building next to a logo that looks like a stomach with a human inside. He approaches the front entrance and pulls an ID card out of his wallet.

He slides the card through a card reader that beeps and as the automatic doors slide open a computerized female voice greets him, “Welcome, test subject Stan.”

Stan enters the lobby and sees a panther woman sitting behind the front desk. Her name is Ms. Filona and she’s the clerk. The pantheress is about 9 feet tall with a glossy coat of fur. She’s wearing a shirt over her three pairs of eye catching D cup breasts. Ms. Filona is known to always be grumpy and is a strong minded feminist. The last guy she caught looking at her chest was given a one way ticket to the inside of her hot gut, so Stan resists the urge.

“Good morning, Filona.” Stan greets her.

The grouchy pantheress’ whiskers twitch as she frowns at him, “Bah! I hate mornings!”

“Who wants to test something on me today?” Stan asks as he chuckles at Filona’s behavior.

“Dr. Zorno and Dr. Kate need a guinea pig.” She waves her clawed hand dismissively.

Stan nods before he walks off through a long white hallway and gets on an elevator. He gets off the elevator at the third floor where he arrives at Dr. Zorno and Dr. Kate’s lab. He opens the door and enters the lab and spots the two scientists.

Dr. Zorno is a 12 foot tall silver dragon with his wings folded up against his back. He doesn’t wear clothes, which leaves his rather enormous shaft in clear view. He’s a little on the pudgy side and has a long tail that drags on the ground behind him.

Dr. Kate is… well, Stan has never been able to figure out what Dr. Kate is. He just refers to her as a mouth monster. She looks human above the waist with long blond hair and gorgeous breasts, but below the waist her body looks like a huge round ball of pink flesh 5 feet tall and 5 feet wide. The bottom of the round part of her body connects directly to two large feet, which causes her waddle whenever she walks around. The strangest part about her is that across the front of her ball-like lower body is a huge pair of lips. The huge lower mouth is completely functional with a huge tongue. Stan heard that those lips open directly into Dr. Kate’s stomach. On the other side of Dr. Kate’s ball-like body, are two massive ass cheeks.

The two scientists smile at Stan when they see him enter.

“Ah, Stan! You’re just in time.” Dr. Zorno exclaims, “Dr. Kate and I need someone to test our latest creation.”

“What is it?” Stan asks curiously.

“It’s a new type of lotion.” Dr. Kate explains, “It’s meant to protect a human from digestion. We call it Digestion Block, because it’s like sun block except it protects against stomach acid.”

“Wow that could change the world!” Stan exclaims.

“Exactly! Many monsters eat humans because they love the feeling of a big live meal squirming in their belly. The only problem is that digestion quickly makes the live meal into a dead one and the monster’s enjoyment is cut short.” Dr. Zorno says, “But with this lotion, a human will stay alive through the whole thing and provide a monster with hours of enjoyment!”

“Er… right.” Stan replies. That wasn’t exactly what he meant when he said it could change the world, “But how am I suppose to help you test it?”

Dr. Zorno and Dr. Kate grin at him.

“Uh-oh!” Stan exclaims.
1312.title: Stan the test subject

13121.content:
Stan looks nervously from Dr. Zorno to Dr. Kate. He's more than a little unnerved by their unspoken proposal, "If you guys don't mind, I think I'm going to sit this one out."

"Don't look so worried." Dr. Zorno tries to reassure him, "We've worked all the kinks out of the lotion, it's sure to work this time."

Stan raises an eyebrow, "... This time?"

"Um... To be honest, we've had some less than satisfactory results up to this point." Dr. Kate admits.

"Could you elaborate?" Stan asks.

"Well," Dr. Zorno starts, "our first two test subjects didn't exactly come out alive and kicking."

"They were completely reduced to shit." Dr. Kate laments, "the lotion does leave a tangy sweet aftertaste on the tongue though. So I suppose, in a sense, it wasn't a complete failure."

"Yes, the flavoring is very good. Unfortunately we're scientists, not chefs." Dr. Zorno sighs.

"Maybe we should switch professions?" D. Kate suggests. The two scientists share a hearty laugh as Stan roles his eyes, "So what makes you think it'll work this time, if so far all you've been able to do is produce a palatable lotion?"

"It didn't end there." Dr. Zorno explains, "we made some real progress before we applied the lotion to our third guinea p- volunteer." He corrects himself, "The lotion completely protected her skin. She came out looking perfect."

"Really?! That's amazing!" Stan gapes.

"... Unfortunately." Dr. Kate butts in, "It didn't protect her insides. Digestive juices and bile managed to get into her through the mouth and vulva. The results weren't pretty, and neither was the smell."

"Yes, when she came out my backside I was very pleased with her consistency." Dr. Zorno elaborates, "She didn't squirt out, or emerge as separate droppings, but slid out as one dry, solid entity."

"That was real progress, groundbreaking even." Dr. Kate adds.

"We realized something was wrong when we tried to congratulated her, however. Dr. Kate gave her a pat on the back and stool started flowing out of her eye-sockets. As it turns out, the lotion protected her epidermis, but it couldn't protect her insides. All her vital organs had been reduced to feces."

"Not what we were hoping for. Very unfortunate. On the bright side though, I heard the medical school we sent her to accumulated a lot of useful data after examining her. Not too surprising, she was a very unusual specimen after all."

"Yes, there's always that." Dr. Zorno agrees.

"So what's going to stop the same thing from happening to me?" Stan asks, still nervous as hell.

"Like I said, we've remodeled the lotion. It will seep in, and have more of a protective effect." Dr. Kate claims.

Dr. Zorno nods, "Yes, it should protect the interior as well as the exterior... That's the theory anyway. Just try not to swallow any bile, just in case."

Stan sighs and closes his eyes. He rubs his temple furiously. What should he do? The paycheck for this job had to be huge, and both of the doctors were incredibly intelligent. If they said the lotion worked, it probably would, right?

"All right, I'm in."

The two doctors smile, "You made the right decision." Dr. Zorno pats him on the back, "Now lets get you out of those clothes and apply the lotion."

The next half hour the lotion is liberally applied to his body by the two doctors. The giant dragon kneads it into his shoulders while the 'mouth' monster, Dr. Kate, massages it into his hindquarters. Squirting a large glob of the lotion into her right hand, she grabs ahold of his member. It comes alive instantly. She begins to jerk him off at a furious pace while, somehow, never losing her straight face.

"D- Dr. Kate?"

"This is one of your more sensitive areas, is it not? It should probably have more lotion rubbed into it than other areas." She responds in a cool, professional voice.

"I- ... I couldn't agree with you more." Stan sighs.

Dr. Kate moves her face to the right as a small spurt of semen erupts from Stan's boner. She then moves her spry fingers to his ball-sack. She cups it in her hands and begins kneading it. The two monsters continue applying the lotion until Stan is giving off a shiny gleam from the balls of his feet to the tip of his hair. Stan gives his glazed arm a lick. Hey, they're right! It does taste tangy!

"I'll explain what's going to happen as you travel through your eater's gastrointestinal tract." The large dragon says to Stan, "You're going to ingested, swallowed whole and alive. You'll travel down to the stomach where you'll be basted in a number of nasty fluids intent on breaking you around. The stomach will get pretty hot, and you'll be churned and tossed around for several hours. Eventually you'll be sucked into the small intestines. Things will get pretty damn tight but you'll manage. The intestines will also try to break down your proteins but, if you made it through the stomach unscathed, you should be fine. After snaking your way through the small intestines you'll be thrust into the colon. Things will get a bit roomier. Just sit tight and you'll wind up in your eater's rectum. You'll eventually be shat out perfectly fine, though you'll probably need a shower... or two... or three."

"All right, that was probably more information than I needed to know. So, which of you will be eating me?"

"Oh, neither of us." Dr. Kate replies.

"Huh?" Stan asks

The two doctors gently grip Stan's shoulders and march him off towards a test room within their lab.

"We're just observing this time." She explains, opening up the door to the white test room. It's a large room, all white, except for a long panel of glass, most likely a one way window. In the center of the room is a large platter.

"Have a seat and we'll send the other volunteer in to meet you." Dr. Zorno explains.

Stan shrugs, "All right." The two doctors leave as Stan sits his basted ass down in the center of the platter. He feels a bit exposed sitting their naked, buttered up like a christmas ham, but he's also a bit excited. He might be the first human to ever survive a journey through a monster! In just a few minutes someone someone is going to show up and devour him, alive. He feels the stirring of an erection as the door opens.

It seems he's going to be eaten by

info.brief_description: You're a human living in a world inhabited by monsters. (vore/unbirth/etc)
info.description:
Welcome to a rather terrifying world where monsters and humans coexist. They attend the same schools, work in the same office buildings, and some even break social taboos and marry! Make no mistake though, humans are second class citizens at best. Smooth, fleshy, and highly tantalizing, humans are not only at the bottom of the social ladder, but they're at the bottom of the food chain as well.

Though allowed to attend the same institutions and public facilities, humans have very few guaranteed rights. They can be, at any time without reason, snatched up and devoured by a hungry monster. This is quite a common occurrence and, while some humans live to be a ripe old age, most don't.

Will you be one of the lucky ones?.... Or will you wind up adding to some monstrosities waistline? It's entirely up to you.
